ingredient.name: Inulin
ingredient.description: Chicory-derived prebiotic fiber with selective bacterial fermentation properties

microbiome_effects.mechanism: Selective fermentation in colon by specific bacterial enzymes with cross-feeding effects
β(2→1) fructan degradation produces SCFAs and enhances gut barrier function

metabolic_effects.mechanism: Enhanced SCFA production primarily acetate with moderate butyrate through selective fermentation

symptom_effects.population_notes: Relieves constipation and improves stool consistency with reduced bloating at appropriate doses

citations.title: Systematic review of inulin effects on gut microbiota
